letter:
The lips are close to the teeth.

Lower jaw is a bit lower.

Soft palate is lifted, but the narrower passage is on the first halfof the palate, while it is wide on the other parts of it.

The tip of the tongue pushes the gamma of the lower incisors whilethe middle part lifts to the palate and creates a narrow passage for theairstream. The back of the tongue is more lifted to the soft palate thenwith sound I. The upper teeth support the edges of the tongue.

After the pronunciation the tongue immediately pulls backwards.

Vocal chords vibrate - the sound is voiced.

Concentrates of acoustic energy:

  1. 100-400Hz
  2. 2300-2500Hz
  3. 3200-3300Hz
